title: [Bug] After tapping some items of the menu of Study screen, unnecessary changes get shown for a moment
body:
Thank you always, developers.

###### Reproduction Steps
1. `Settings` -> `Reviewing` -> `App bar buttons` -> `Enable whiteboard` -> `Menu only` 
2. Open Study screen
3. Tap `More options` (`︙`)
4. Tap `Enable whiteboard`




###### Expected Result
Before the menu gets hidden, ripple effect gets shown. Nothing else happens about the menu, as on the case of `Replay audio`.

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10436072/162754899-1542480f-4b06-47a5-8398-7ffb2db73b08.mp4




###### Actual Result
Before the menu gets hidden, ripple effect gets shown, and the color of icons become white, and the each items' string is changed with other string respectively (by whiteboard feature items appearing). 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10436072/162756063-4c913d3a-9ccc-48a2-9cae-b8c3b8064a1e.png)

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10436072/162755061-8bf289fc-43a0-4f0b-90ff-75fb5a8c2967.mp4

- The icon's problem is probably related to #10732.
- The icon's problem happens on other items (For example, `Bury card`, `Mark note`), too.
